meanings.sent1: The brotherhood between the siblings was strong and loving.
meanings.sent2: The brotherhood among the brothers was evident in their support for each other.
meanings.sent3: The brotherhood shared a pizza and laughed together.
meanings.sent4: The brotherhood of siblings stood as a fortress against any challenge.
meanings.sent5: The brotherhood of brothers was unbreakable, like a chain of steel.

meanings.definition: An organization or group of people united by a common interest or goal.
meanings.sent1: The brotherhood of firefighters worked together to save lives.
meanings.sent2: The brotherhood of knights protected the kingdom with honor.
meanings.sent3: The brotherhood organized a charity event to help the community.
meanings.sent4: The brotherhood of athletes pushed each other to reach new heights.
meanings.sent5: The brotherhood of musicians created beautiful harmony on stage.
